note.p: American physician. Studied at Kentucky School of Medicine, 1856–7; graduated from Chicago Medical College, 1870. Practised in Lincoln, Nebraska, Logansport, Indiana, and later in Iola, Kansas, from 1882. In Grayville, Illinois, 1900.
Directory of deceased American physicians, 1804–1929 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 February 2016)
Kansas State Census Collection, 1855–1925 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 August 2014)
